TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, Maria Sirona said:
> 
> 
> I think one name change only is kinda stupid. Because, if, say, one misspells the name they want, then they would be stuck with a name they do not want. Same with the moderator screwing it up. (No offense!)
> 

If we make a mistake we do not hold it against you, and we have usually agreed to a small change if it was clearly a goof.

I'd like to change my name to AtomicTech

Please![;p](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/971609041_P.png ";p")

Oh you would, would you? 

Okay [@AtomicTech](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/210823-atomictech/)

Another question: what if somebody wants a name change after, like, say, 2 years after the first one?

And also,

One name change to just Maria without the Sirona in the end. Repeat, i want my new name to be Maria.

Maria, ya got it?

**Edited <time datetime="2021-09-04T18:14:52Z" title="09/04/2021 06:14  PM" data-short="2 yr">September 4, 2021</time> by Maria Sirona**

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, Maria Sirona said:
> 
> 
> Another question: what if somebody wants a name change after, like, say, 2 years after the first one?
> 

Then they must learn to live with their regrets. 

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, Maria Sirona said:
> 
> 
> i want my new name to be Maria.
> 

Unfortunately, that name is in use.
Ah, ok.
I’m going back and clearing my digital footprint from very old accounts I had as a kid. I’d appreciate if someone could change this name to “qazwsxedcrfvt”

> I’m going back and clearing my digital footprint from very old accounts I had as a kid. I’d appreciate if someone could change this name to “qazwsxedcrfvt”

We could do that, or you could [request that personal info be removed from your account](https://privacyportal-cdn.onetrust.com/dsarwebform/3efb95b4-aed7-4aa8-85d8-488eb074fa8c/696c1409-ef27-4bca-b988-79b966eaeee0.html). Which would you prefer?

Could I please change my name to Jacktical?

It's also below just to make sure its right

Jacktical

Thanks a lot
